text: Grandma always used to paint the ornaments for Christmas when I was a kid.
It was always so fun to paint with her and see the designs she'd come up with. She always told me:
To fill in the squares, click the Left Mouse Button. Make sure to fill them according to the rows and columns.
Remember, for lines like the second row here, there's an empty space between the 3 and the 1!
You can mark that empty space using the Right Mouse Button to make sure you don't fill it in.
